data.scheme_name: Special Provisions for Start-ups - Seed Grant - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides various incentives such as reimbursement, incentives, interest subsidy, lease rental subsidy, seed grant of upto Rs.43.5 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All startups who are DPIIT registered are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The unit must have filed the Udhyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
The plant and machinery installed should be either new or second-hand imported machinery with a residual life of at least 10 years.
The unit should not be on the restrictive list under HEEP 2020.
The unit must have obtained No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable.
The unit should be in commercial production/operation for the benefits, except for Seed Grant, which can be availed based on idea selection.
data.beneficiaries: All startups who are DPIIT registered are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The unit must have filed the Udhyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
The plant and machinery installed should be either new or second-hand imported machinery with a residual life of at least 10 years.
The unit should not be on the restrictive list under HEEP 2020.
The unit must have obtained No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable.
The unit should be in commercial production/operation for the benefits, except for Seed Grant, which can be availed based on idea selection.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The scheme aims to give a further thrust to the promotion of startups and strengthening the ecosystem in the State.
data.objective: To encourage startups, innovation and entrepreneurship.
data.description:
Scheme provides various incentives to startups:
Interest Subsidy: 8% interest subsidy, maximum Rs. 20 lakh per year for 5 years.
Lease Rental Subsidy: 30% reimbursement for general startups, 45% for women-founded startups, up to Rs.5 lakh for 1 year.
Seed Grant: Seed grant up to  Rs.10 lakh per startup.
Net SGST Reimbursement: 100% reimbursement for 7 years, with a cap of 150% FCI.
National Acceleration Program: Support for up to Rs.2.5 lakh for national acceleration programs.
International Acceleration Program: Support for up to Rs.5 lakh for international acceleration programs.
Cloud Computing/Storage Reimbursement: 100% reimbursement of expenses for cloud computing/storage on Haryana-based Data Centres, up to Rs.1 lakh per startup per annum for 3 years.
data.how_to_apply:
Applicants seeking financial assistance are required to submit their applications in prescribed format (Annexure-I) to the Director/ Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises.
Annexure-I: https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060274.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after  the approval from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - Partnership, Private Limited Company, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) - Haryana - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
